test_name: If all MCI criteria met then MCI must be present
short_desc: If (MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN=1) then MCI must equal 1
full_desc: If (Q4a1. MCICRITCLN (MCI criteria - Clinical concern about decline in cognition)=1 (Criteria met) and Q4a2. MCICRITIMP (MCI criteria - Impairment in one or more cognitive domains)=1 (Criteria met) and Q4a3. MCICRITFUN (MCI criteria - Preserved functional independence OR functional dependence not related to cog decline)=1 (Criteria met)) then Q4b. MCI  (MCI (amnestic or non-amnestic)?) must equal 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If (MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN=1) and MCI ne 1

test_name: If less than 3 MCI criteria met then MCI must be absent
short_desc: If (MCICRITCLN ne 1 or MCICRITIMP ne 1 or MCICRITFUN ne 1) then MCI must equal 0
full_desc: If (Q4a1. MCICRITCLN (MCI criteria - Clinical concern about decline in cognition) ne 1 (Criteria not met) or Q4a2. MCICRITIMP (MCI criteria - Impairment in one or more cognitive domains) ne 1 (Criteria not met) or Q4a3. MCICRITFUN (MCI criteria - Preserved functional independence OR functional dependence not related to cog decline) ne 1 (Criteria not met)) then Q4b. MCI  (MCI (amnestic or non-amnestic)?) must equal 0 (No)
test_logic: If (MCICRITCLN ne 1 and MCICRITIMP ne 1 and MCICRITFUN ne 1) and MCI ne 0

test_name: If any IMPNOCI criteria met then IMPNOMCI must be present
short_desc: If (IMPNOMCIFU=1 or IMPNOMCICG=1 or IMPNOMCLCD=1 or IMPNOMCIO=1) then IMPNOMCI should equal 1
full_desc: If Q5a1. IMPNOMCIFU (Cognitively impaired, not MCI reason - Evidence of functional impairment, but normal cognitive testing)=1 (Criteria met) or Q5a2. IMPNOMCICG (Cognitively impaired, not MCI reason - Abnormal cognitive testing but no clinical concern)=1 (Criteria met) or Q5a3. IMPNOMCLCD (Cognitively impaired, not MCI reason - Longstanding cognitive difficulties)=1 (Criteria met) or Q5a4. IMPNOMCIO (Cognitively impaired, not MCI reason - Other)=1 (Criteria met)) then Q5b. IMPNOMCI (Cognitively impaired, not MCI?) should equal 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If (IMPNOMCIFU=1 or IMPNOMCICG=1 or IMPNOMCLCD=1 or IMPNOMCIO=1) and IMPNOMCI ne 1

test_name: If only some MCI criteria met then IMPNOMCI should be present
short_desc: If ((MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP ne 1 and MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (MCICRITCLN ne 1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (MCICRITCLN ne 1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN=1) or (MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP ne 1 and MCICRITFUN=1)) then IMPNOMCI should equal 1
full_desc: If only some MCI criteria met ((Q4a1. MCICRITCLN=1 and Q4a2. MCICRITIMP ne 1 and Q4a3. MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (Q4a1. MCICRITCLN ne 1 and Q4a2. MCICRITIMP=1 and Q4a3. MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (Q4a1. MCICRITCLN=1 and Q4a2. MCICRITIMP=1 and Q4a3. MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (Q4a1. MCICRITCLN ne 1 and Q4a2. MCICRITIMP=1 and Q4a3. MCICRITFUN=1) or (Q4a1. MCICRITCLN=1 and Q4a2. MCICRITIMP ne 1 and Q4a3. MCICRITFUN=1)) then Q5b. IMPNOMCI (Cognitively impaired, not MCI?) should equal 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If ((MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP ne 1 and MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (MCICRITCLN ne 1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN ne 1) or (MCICRITCLN ne 1 and MCICRITIMP=1 and MCICRITFUN=1) or (MCICRITCLN=1 and MCICRITIMP ne 1 and MCICRITFUN=1)) and IMPNOMCI ne 1

test_name: If only the third MCI criteria is met then IMPNOMCI must be absent
short_desc: If (MCICRITFUN=1 and MCICRITCLN ne 1 and MCICRITIMP ne 1) then IMPNOMCI must equal 0
full_desc: If (Q4a3. MCICRITFUN (MCI criteria - Preserved functional independence OR functional dependence not related to cog decline)=1 (Criteria met) and Q4a1. MCICRITCLN (MCI criteria - Clinical concern about decline in cognition) ne 1 (Criteria not met) and Q4a2. MCICRITIMP (MCI criteria - Impairment in one or more cognitive domains) ne 1 (Criteria not met)) then Q5b. IMPNOMCI (Cognitively impaired, not MCI?) must equal 0 (No)
test_logic: If (MCICRITFUN=1 and MCICRITCLN ne 1 and MCICRITIMP ne 1) and IMPNOMCI ne 0

test_name: Cognitive diagnoses on D1a align with determination on C2/C2T
short_desc: If COGSTAT in (1,2) then NORMCOG should equal 1
full_desc: If Form C2/C2T COGSTAT (overall appraisal) in (1,2) (Better than normal for age or normal for age), then Q2. NORMCOG (Unimpaired cognition & behavior?) should equal 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If COGSTAT in (1,2) and NORMCOG ne 1

test_name: Cognitive diagnoses on D1a align with MoCA scores on C2
short_desc: If RMMODEC2C2T=2 or blank and MOCATOTS <4 then NORMCOG should not equal 1
full_desc: If Form C2 Q1f. MOCATOTS (uncorrected MoCA total score) <4 then Q2. NORMCOG (Unimpaired cognition & behavior?) should not equal 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If RMMODEC2C2T=2 or blank and MOCATOTS <4 and NORMCOG=1

test_name: Cognitive diagnoses on D1a align with MoCA scores on C2T
short_desc: If RMMODEC2C2T=1 and MOCBTOTS <4 then NORMCOG should not equal 1
full_desc: If Form C2T Q1d. MOCBTOTS (uncorrected MoCA blind total score) <4 then Q2. NORMCOG (Unimpaired cognition & behavior?) should not equal 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If RMMODEC2C2T=1 and MOCBTOTS <4 and NORMCOG=1

test_name: Normal diagnosis on D1a aligns with DECCLCOG & DECCLBE on B9
short_desc: If NORMCOG=1 then DECCLCOG & DECCLBE should equal 0 or blank
full_desc: If Q2. NORMCOG (Unimpaired cognition & behavior?)=1 (Yes) then Form B9 Q8. DECCLCOG (Impaired cognition per clinician) and Form B9 Q11. DECCLBE (Participant experiencing behavioral symptoms per clinician) should equal 0 (No) or blank
test_logic: If NORMCOG=1 and (DECCLCOG ne 0 or blank and DECCLBE ne 0 or blank)

test_name: Normal diagnosis on D1a aligns with DECCLCOG & DECCLBE on B9
short_desc: If NORMCOG=0 then DECCLCOG or DECCLBE should equal 1
full_desc: If Q2. NORMCOG (Unimpaired cognition & behavior?)=0 (No) then either Form B9 Q8. DECCLCOG (Impaired cognition per clinician) or Form B9 Q11. DECCLBE (Participant experiencing behavioral symptoms per clinician) should equal 1 (Yes)

test_name: Both dementia and MBI cannot be present
short_desc: If DEMENTED=1 then MBI cannot equal 1
full_desc: If Q3. DEMENTED (Dementia?)=1 (Yes) then Q7. MBI (MBI?) cannot equal 1 (Yes)

test_name: At least one cognitive diagnosis, including normal cognitition & behavior, should be "present"
short_desc: At least one of the following should equal 1: NORMCOG, DEMENTED, MCI, IMPNOMCI, MBI
full_desc: At least one of the following should equal 1: Q2. NORMCOG (Unimpaired cognition & behavior?), Q3. DEMENTED (Dementia?), Q4b. MCI  (MCI (amnestic or non-amnestic)?), Q5b. IMPNOMCI (Cognitively impaired, not MCI?), Q7. MBI (MBI?)
test_logic: If NORMCOG=0 and DEMENTED=0 and MCI=0 and IMPNOMCI=0 and MBI=0
